snippet: President Bingu wa Mutharika, who has governed Malawi since 2004, was hospitalized Thursday after suffering a heart attack, medical and government officials said.
abstract: President Bingu wa Mutharika of Malawi, who has governed the country since 2004, is hospitalized after suffering a heart attack.
lead_paragraph: President Bingu wa Mutharika, who has governed Malawi since 2004, was hospitalized Thursday after suffering a heart attack, medical and government officials said.
